title: Contribution: Efficient Sorting of DateField/DateTools Encoded Timestamp Long Values

Hello Tim,

As promised, the sort functionality for "long" values is included in the
attached files.

patchTestSort.txt contains the diff info. for my modifications to the
TestSort.java class

Let me know if you have any questions.

Regards,
